<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Swift Banishment](/Feats.aspx?ID=301) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 126 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
You critically hit a creature that is not on its home plane.

**Requirements**
You have a [_banishment_](/Spells.aspx?ID=19) spell prepared.

</column>

---

The force of your blow sends your victim back to its home plane. You expend a _banishment_ spell you have prepared, affecting the creature you critically hit without needing to cast the spell. The creature can attempt to resist the spell as normal.

<title level="2">Swift Banishment leads to...</title>
[Improved Swift Banishment](/Feats.aspx?ID=307)
name: Swift Banishment
requirement: You have a   banishment   spell prepared.
